attributes.review: This app has brought me nothing but bad!!!! My daughter was on this app frequently and I believe this is the reason she became a radical liberal! We cant let our kids be mind controlled! If you want your kids to be raised good conservatives- don’t download this app! Also it attracts bugs with a special frequency
attributes.title: Turned my daughter Liberal!

attributes.review: The app itself is glitchy and poorly made... but honestly I’m not surprised considering the fact that the orange man Donnie made it. The software is awful and it downloaded a virus onto my phone and now it overheats all the time. It keeps crashing. -10/10 do not recommend. Also vote this man out of office:)
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: Every time I opened the app, my phone would glitch. Every so often, though, the app would work only to display a horrid picture of some man. It haunted my dreams and honestly nothing good has come to me since I downloaded this app! In my opinion just don’t get it.
attributes.title: Glitchy and Not worth your time...

attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible! I downloaded it trying to find a reason trump would be a decent president but i just found more reasons to hate him. TRUMP IS A HOMOPHOBIC RAPIST AND RACIST GARBAGE CAN IN THE OFFICE!!!!!! I don't understand how separating people from their families and deporting people who were just trying to work and have a better life for their children makes trump a good president.

My life was perfectly normal until I downloaded this app but the second I downloaded it I felt this pit in my stomach and I realized that I was hungry so I went into the kitchen to get some food and there was no food I was starving and as soon as I deleted the app all my food came back I will never download this app again 😭😭
attributes.title: IT ALMOST STARVED ME TO DEATH

attributes.review: Every time I would open the app, my phone would crash & power off. It made my phone lag & press buttons on its own. A couple of my friends have also had this same problem, would not recommend downloading this app
attributes.title: Don’t recommend

attributes.review: This app took up all my I cloud space and wasted half my battery. THEN when I opened the app it was glitching and it kept kicking me out of the app.🤮 Anyways I prefer TikTok so don’t BAN that app.🥰 Oh and don’t forget us Gen z kids are not going to stop until we get justice so watch your back cuz this is just the beginning. 😘
attributes.title: AWFUL 😡🤮

attributes.review:
This app is too glitchy and takes up too much storage space.
Don’t download this trashy app💕☄️ I downloaded it a few days ago and then the big orange 🍊 Cheeto had shown up to my house 🏠 and watched me as I slept this behavior didn’t stop ✋🏽 🛑 and he broke in🐸and murdered my entire family💋 Thank you so much

Honestly, I thought that I would be disappointed when opening this app, but in reality, I was so disgusted that I physically ached and threw up all over my room. I’m debating on suing but he would win considering he is a white middle aged man and says nothing but lies. Very disappointed to be living in this country with such a dingus in power.
attributes.title: Trumps a fascist

attributes.review: Basically no more than a couple seconds of having it downloaded and the first thing it asks is for notification and a phone number. I immediately start getting hounded by his team. All in all bad app really bad. If you care for your privacy don’t download.
attributes.title: Data Mining Galore
